definition: having no net electric charge, one who does not side with any party in a war or dispute
details:
adjective
- having no net electric charge
= synonyms: electroneutral
- having no hue
= example: having no hue
= synonyms: achromatic
- lacking distinguishing quality or characteristics
= example: lacking distinguishing quality or characteristics
- not supporting or favoring either side in a war, dispute, or contest
- having no personal preference
= synonyms: impersonal
- possessing no distinctive quality or characteristics
- having only a limited ability to react chemically
= synonyms: inert
noun
- one who does not side with any party in a war or dispute
